name: Drkamarul.github.io
body:
### Welcome to Kamarul's Pages
I am a medical lecturer in Epidemiology and Biostatistics at the School of Medical Sciences, Universiti Sains Malaysia, Malaysia. I am currenly doing a PhD program at CHICAS, Faculty of Health and Medicine, Lancaster University. My supervisors are these two wonderful people : Dr Thomas Keegan and Distinguished Professor Peter Diggle.

### My other website
You can check my blogs at http://designdataanalysis.wordpress.com for some useful study designs and data analysis especially in the field of health and medicine .... 

ENJOY !!!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
